title: Asset Database
deprecated_tip: {oldName} has been deprecated in version {version}, please replace with {newName}
global_readonly_tip: Global variable {name} field is already used by asset process and cannot be overwritten, please use other field
asset_d_b_pause_tips: Asset database is locked, asset operations ({operate}) will be delayed, please wait

fail.unknown: Failed to save asset: unknown error
fail.uuid: Failed to save asset: cannot identify UUID
fail.asset: Failed to save asset: cannot find asset {asset}
fail.content: Failed to save asset: file content format is incorrect
fail.readonly: Failed to save asset: cannot operate on readonly asset

fail.unknown: Failed to save asset META: unknown error
fail.uuid: Failed to save asset META: cannot identify UUID
fail.content: Failed to save asset META: file content format is incorrect
fail.readonly: Failed to save asset META: cannot operate on readonly asset

fail.source: Failed to rename asset: source file does not exist
fail.include: Failed to rename asset: source file cannot be included in target file
fail.parent: Failed to rename asset: target file parent directory is incorrect

init.no_asset_db_list: Asset database list is empty, please check the asset configuration

operation.invalid_url: Invalid URL: input URL must be a string and start with db://
operation.exists_url: Invalid URL: URL points to non-existent asset
operation.readonly: Invalid target path: target is a readonly folder

fail.unknown: Failed to delete asset: unknown error
fail.url: Failed to delete asset: invalid parameter
fail.unexist: Failed to delete asset: file does not exist
fail.readonly: Failed to delete asset: readonly file cannot be deleted

fail.unknown: Failed to create asset ({target}): unknown error
fail.type: Failed to create asset: unrecognized asset type ({type})
fail.url: Failed to create asset: invalid address ({url})
fail.exist: Failed to create asset: file already exists
fail.drop: Failed to create asset: imported asset address ({target}) does not exist
fail.to_url: Failed to create asset: file path ({target}) may be outside project scope, cannot convert to project URL
fail.uuid: Failed to create asset: cannot convert parameter ({target}) to project URL

import_asset.meta_exists: {name} asset meta file already exists, skip meta import, enable in preferences if needed

open_asset.preference_program_warning: For better script opening, please configure script opening application in {preferences} -> {program} -> {scriptEditor}

fail.no_asset: Failed to open asset: cannot find asset

fail.unknown: Failed to copy asset: unknown error
fail.url: Failed to copy asset: invalid parameter

restore_asset_d_b_from_cache_in_valid.upgrade: Asset startup cache reuse mechanism is invalid during project upgrade
restore_asset_d_b_from_cache_in_valid.no_library_path: Library folder does not exist, asset startup cache reuse mechanism is invalid
